text: Mary of Burgundy (13 February 1457 â€“ 27 March 1482), nicknamed the Rich, was a member of the House of Valois-Burgundy who ruled a collection of states that included the duchies of Limburg, Brabant, Luxembourg, the counties of Namur, Holland, Hainautand other territories, from 1477 until her death in 1482. He was a son Charles the Bold, grandson of Philip the Good, great-grandson of John the Fearless, great-great-grandson of Philip the Bold, and great-great- great-grandson of John II of France. Category:1457 births Category:1482 deaths Category:Counts of Holland
title: Mary of Burgundy
